articles.description: Virtuosi Racing’s Jack Doohan claimed the first Formula 2 victory of his career, dominating the Sprint Race in tricky conditions. Rain that had fallen over F1 qualifying provided a test for the drivers and one that the Alpine Academy driver managed best.
